channel.title: Getting started on Stonks
channel.description: Recent content in Getting started on Stonks

item.title: Installation
item.description: Installing Stonks is easy. It can be done in one line with git. Installing Through Terminal This is very easy. Enter your directory of choice, and clone the repository with git. Here is the command to run in case you don’t know how to clone with git Copy git clone https://github.com/StonksPython/Stonks.git Installing through GitHub This is even easier. Click the GitHub Icon on the menu of this website, and then click “Download as Zip”.

item.title: Usage
item.description: With the code installed, using Stonks is as simple as this: Copy import stonks or Copy import stonks as st
